categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Nagarreken was a male Cathar who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a Jedi Master during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. During the war he served on Carrick Station, a space station in the Republic Fleet where he sold equipment. He wore tattered ritualists robes and carried a lightsaber.

Nagarreken first appeared in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel. In the game he served as an equipment vendor for the Tython and Korriban Republic flashpoints, only accepting relics from those flashpoints as currency.
